Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
43 Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka, Kusalattika
Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka, Kusalattika
52.
152Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanocittasamuṭṭhāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
153Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanocittasamuṭṭhāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṃ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
